site.title: Test Portfolio
site.description: A test portfolio website template for demonstration purposes.

about.title: My Story
about.content: This is a test about section. It describes the test user's background and interests.

items.title: Test Project 1
items.description: This is a detailed test project description for Project 1. It showcases the use of React and Bootstrap in building a responsive portfolio website. The project includes features like dynamic content loading, responsive design, and modern UI components.

items.title: Test Project 2
items.description: This is a detailed test project description for Project 2. It demonstrates the development of a multiplayer online game using React and CSS Grid Layouts. The project features interactive gameplay, responsive design, and real-time data synchronization.

items.title: Test Project 3
items.description: This is a detailed test project description for Project 3. It involves a web application for visualizing and analyzing data trends, built with JavaScript and modern web technologies. The project includes features like interactive charts, data filtering, and real-time updates.

items.title: Test Project 4
items.description: This is a detailed test project description for Project 4. It showcases a comprehensive system management application developed with C++, featuring efficient data processing, user-friendly interface, and robust error handling.
